description.narrative: 6.6 By 2019 Office of Births and Deaths (MOHS), and NCRA have the capacity to register all births within an integrated Civil Registration and Vital Statistics system., which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 6.0 Improved and equitable prevention of and response to violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect of children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 6.6 By 2019 Office of Births and Deaths (MOHS), and NCRA have the capacity to register all births within an integrated Civil Registration and Vital Statistics system.

description.narrative: In 2019, 104,378 children were registered. A Comprehensive Country Assessment of the Civil Registration and Vital Statistics (CRVS) and Identity Management Systems were launched in August 2019 together with a Costed Strategic Plan that is now under implementation by the National Civil Registration Authority. This further builds the capacity of Government to register all birthdays within an integrated CRVS system. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of Civil Registrars or other cadres (i.e. health workers, community leaders, teachers act.) who are legally mandated to notify or register births and who have received training on birth notification or registration
Existence of free and universal birth registration service within the civil registration in accordance with national legal requirement

baseline.value: Birth registration not within the Civil Registration

target.value: 2019:The National Civil Registration Authority is fully functional

actual.value: 2019:Birth registration is now free but not yet universal in Sierra Leone.

title.narrative: Country has an interoperable service delivery with Health

Existence of a national civil registration and vital statistics strategy(ies) which reflects recent international standards and principles for CRVS systems and are in line with the human rights conventions and protocols ratified by the State

target.value: 2019:CRVS Country Assessment Report and costed plan available

actual.value: 2019:CRVSCountry Assessment Report and costed plan in place.
